Keywords: Animal , Deviant , Monster , Past
Real Name: Various
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
THE INSPIRATION FOR THE LEGENDS: Stealth. FREE: Place Werewolf Deviant in a square of hindering terrain within 4 squares and line of fire.
DEVOUR THE HUMAN CATTLE: Steal Energy. When Werewolf Deviant KO's an opposing character with an attack, after resolutions, heal Werewolf Deviant equal to the damage it dealt.
SHEEP'S CLOTHING: Shape Change, but succeeds on 4-6.

Comments
March 3, 2022
Bat-Phreak
Could be hard to get these guys to land on Click 6 and/or 7, but if they do they have a realistic chance to heal between 3-5 clicks: 2 x Steal Energy, then 1-3 from a KO. With a little Empower and 2 x 1-shot KO's, they could "heal" 14 x clicks: 7 for each of two KO's. ;-)
December 21, 2021
gambitrmp
I know the rares(?) offer more options but I wish the commons didn't come to 25 points over an even build. Too bad Werewolf deviant isn't super common so they can be a generic army. Oh well. Over nice I guess.
December 8, 2021
Goop
I like the Prec strike and exploit, it gets around most defenses. Its kind of annoying having his special powers in the middle and end but they are both good when they come up. Great mobility with trait and charge. It probably makes a lot more sense to run 2 of him at his lower line though for the same cost.
